typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id_code as string,
		description as string,
		is_hidden as integer,
		autoadd as integer,
		reserved1 as string,
		loggable as string,
		id_domain as string,
		pname as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	batchSize: 2,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CodeExpense
source(output(
		id_code as string,
		description as string,
		is_hidden as integer,
		autoadd as integer,
		reserved1 as string,
		loggable as string,
		id_domain as string,
		pname as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CodeExpenseSources
source(output(
		id_code as string,
		description as string,
		is_hidden as integer,
		autoadd as integer,
		reserved1 as string,
		loggable as string,
		id_domain as string,
		pname as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PayTypes
source(output(
		id_expense_rec as string,
		id_user as string,
		record_date as string,
		id_project as string,
		id_code_expense as string,
		amount as integer,
		comment as string,
		commit_state as integer,
		id_code_currency as string,
		id_code_expense_source as string,
		id_domain as string,
		read_only_comment as string,
		flags as string,
		id_picture as string,
		reserved1 as string,
		reserved2 as string,
		creator as string,
		create_timestamp as integer,
		modifier as string,
		modify_timestamp as integer,
		mileage as integer,
		id_assignment as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExpenseRecords
source(output(
		id_sheet as string,
		id_timesheet as string,
		id_user as string,
		pname as string,
		state as integer,
		start_date as string,
		end_date as string,
		id_domain as string,
		id_approver as string,
		level as integer,
		reserved1 as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> UserTimeSheet
source(output(
		id_sheet as string,
		id_timesheet as string,
		id_user as string,
		pname as string,
		state as integer,
		start_date as string,
		end_date as string,
		id_domain as string,
		id_approver as string,
		level as integer,
		reserved1 as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> UserExpenseSheet
source(output(
		id_usersheetnote as string,
		id_usersheet as string,
		note_text as string,
		note_creator as string,
		create_timestamp as integer,
		extra_string_1 as string,
		extra_string_2 as string,
		extra_string_3 as string,
		id_domain as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SheetNotes
source(output(
		id_time_rec as string,
		id_user as string,
		record_date as string,
		id_code_task as string,
		id_code_pay_type as string,
		id_project as string,
		time_amount as integer,
		comment as string,
		commit_state as integer,
		id_domain as string,
		id_code_bill_type as string,
		id_group as string,
		creator as string,
		create_timestamp as integer,
		modifier as string,
		modify_timestamp as integer,
		id_assignment as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TimeRec
source(output(
		id_code as string,
		description as string,
		is_hidden as integer,
		autoadd as integer,
		reserved1 as string,
		loggable as string,
		id_domain as string,
		pname as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CurrencyCode
CodeExpense select(mapColumn(
		id_code,
		expenses_description = description,
		is_hidden,
		loggable,
		expenses_name = pname,
		load_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CodeExpenseMap
CodeExpenseSources select(mapColumn(
		id_code,
		expense_source_description = description,
		is_hidden,
		loggable,
		expense_source_name = pname,
		load_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CodeExpenseSourceMap
PayTypes select(mapColumn(
		id_code,
		pay_type_description = description,
		is_hidden,
		loggable,
		pay_type_name = pname,
		load_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> PayTypeMap
ExpenseRecords select(mapColumn(
		id_expense_rec,
		id_user,
		record_date,
		id_project,
		id_code_expense,
		amount,
		comment,
		commit_state,
		id_code_currency,
		id_code_expense_source,
		load_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> ExpenseRecordsMap
UserTimeSheet select(mapColumn(
		id_sheet,
		id_timesheet,
		id_user,
		pname,
		state,
		start_date,
		end_date,
		id_approver,
		level,
		comment = reserved1,
		load_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UserTimeSheetMap
UserExpenseSheet select(mapColumn(
		id_sheet,
		id_timesheet,
		id_user,
		pname,
		state,
		start_date,
		end_date,
		id_approver,
		level,
		comment = reserved1,
		load_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UserExpenseSheetMap
SheetNotes select(mapColumn(
		id_usersheetnote,
		id_usersheet,
		note_text,
		note_creator,
		create_date = create_timestamp,
		extra_string_1,
		extra_string_2,
		extra_string_3,
		load_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SheetNotesMap
TimeRec select(mapColumn(
		id_time_rec,
		id_user,
		record_date,
		id_code_task,
		id_code_pay_type,
		id_project,
		time_amount,
		comment,
		commit_state,
		id_code_bill_type,
		load_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> TimeRecMap
TimeRecMap derive(UOM_Code = 'h') ~> UOMCode
ExpenseRecordsMap, CurrencyCode join(id_code_currency == id_code,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinCurrency
JoinCurrency select(mapColumn(
		id_expense_rec,
		id_user,
		record_date,
		id_project,
		id_code_expense,
		amount,
		comment,
		commit_state,
		id_code_currency,
		id_code_expense_source,
		currency_key = pname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectExpenseREC
SelectExpenseREC filter(id_code_expense == 'Lodging/Room') ~> FilterLodging
FilterLodging derive(Vendor_ID = '',
		load_time = currentTimestamp(),
		record_date = toDate((concat(substring(record_date,0,4),'-',substring(record_date,5,2),'-',substring(record_date,7,2))))) ~> LoadDateERL
CodeExpenseSourceMap derive(load_time = currentTimestamp()) ~> LoadDateCES
CodeExpenseMap derive(load_time = currentTimestamp()) ~> LoadDateCE
PayTypeMap derive(load_time = currentTimestamp()) ~> LoadDatePT
SelectExpenseREC derive(load_time = currentTimestamp(),
		record_date = toDate((concat(substring(record_date,0,4),'-',substring(record_date,5,2),'-',substring(record_date,7,2))))) ~> LoadDateER
UOMCode derive(load_time = currentTimestamp(),
		record_date = toDate((concat(substring(record_date,0,4),'-',substring(record_date,5,2),'-',substring(record_date,7,2))))) ~> LoadDateTR
UserExpenseSheetMap derive(load_time = currentTimestamp(),
		start_date = toDate((concat(substring(start_date,0,4),'-',substring(start_date,5,2),'-',substring(start_date,7,2)))),
		end_date = toDate((concat(substring(end_date,0,4),'-',substring(end_date,5,2),'-',substring(end_date,7,2))))) ~> LoadDateUES
SheetNotesMap derive(load_time = currentTimestamp(),
		create_date = add(toDate('1970-01-01'),toInteger(create_date/(60*60*24)))) ~> LoadDateSN
UserTimeSheetMap derive(load_time = currentTimestamp(),
		start_date = toDate((concat(substring(start_date,0,4),'-',substring(start_date,5,2),'-',substring(start_date,7,2)))),
		end_date = toDate((concat(substring(end_date,0,4),'-',substring(end_date,5,2),'-',substring(end_date,7,2))))) ~> LoadDateUT
LoadDateSN filter(note_text == 'Approved for Level 1') ~> ApprovedFilter
LoadDateSN filter(like(note_text , 'Rejected%')) ~> RejectedFilter
LoadDateSN filter(note_text == 'Submitted for Approval') ~> SubmitFilter
SubmitFilter window(over(id_usersheet),
	asc(create_date, true),
	Rank = rowNumber()) ~> RankSubmit
RankSubmit filter(Rank == 1) ~> FilterRankSubmit
RejectedFilter window(over(id_usersheet),
	asc(create_date, true),
	Rank = rowNumber()) ~> RankRejected
RankRejected filter(Rank == 1) ~> FilterRankReject
ApprovedFilter window(over(id_usersheet),
	asc(create_date, true),
	rank = rowNumber()) ~> RankApproved
RankApproved filter(rank == 1) ~> FilterRankApproved
LoadDateCE sink(input(
		id_code as string,
		expenses_description as string,
		is_hidden as integer,
		loggable as string,
		expenses_name as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id_code'],
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss') ~> CodeExpenseTRM
LoadDateCES sink(input(
		id_code as string,
		expense_source_description as string,
		is_hidden as integer,
		loggable as string,
		expense_source_name as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> CodeExpenseSourceTRM
LoadDatePT sink(input(
		id_code as string,
		pay_type_description as string,
		is_hidden as integer,
		loggable as string,
		pay_type_name as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> PayTypeTRM
LoadDateER sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> ExpenseRecTRM
LoadDateUT sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> UserTimeSheetTRM
LoadDateUES sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> UserExpenseSheetTRM
LoadDateSN sink(input(
		id_usersheetnote as string,
		id_usersheet as string,
		note_text as string,
		note_creator as string,
		create_date as string,
		extra_string_1 as string,
		extra_string_2 as string,
		extra_string_3 as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id_usersheetnote,
		id_usersheet,
		note_text,
		note_creator,
		create_date,
		extra_string_1,
		extra_string_2,
		extra_string_3,
		load_time
	),
	dateFormat:'yyyy-MM-dd') ~> SheetNotesTRM
LoadDateTR sink(input(
		id_time_rec as string,
		id_user as string,
		record_date as string,
		id_code_task as string,
		id_code_pay_type as string,
		id_project as string,
		time_amount as integer,
		comment as string,
		commit_state as integer,
		id_domain as string,
		id_code_bill_type as string,
		id_group as string,
		creator as string,
		create_timestamp as integer,
		modifier as string,
		modify_timestamp as integer,
		id_assignment as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> TimeRecTRM
LoadDateERL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> ExpenseRecordLodge
FilterRankApproved sink(input(
		id_usersheetnote as string,
		id_usersheet as string,
		note_text as string,
		note_creator as string,
		create_date as date,
		extra_string_1 as string,
		extra_string_2 as string,
		extra_string_3 as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> ApprovedSheetTRM
FilterRankReject sink(input(
		id_usersheetnote as string,
		id_usersheet as string,
		note_text as string,
		note_creator as string,
		create_date as date,
		extra_string_1 as string,
		extra_string_2 as string,
		extra_string_3 as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id_usersheetnote,
		id_usersheet,
		note_text,
		note_creator,
		create_date,
		extra_string_1,
		extra_string_2,
		extra_string_3,
		load_time
	)) ~> RejectedSheetTRM
FilterRankSubmit sink(input(
		id_usersheetnote as string,
		id_usersheet as string,
		note_text as string,
		note_creator as string,
		create_date as date,
		extra_string_1 as string,
		extra_string_2 as string,
		extra_string_3 as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id_usersheetnote,
		id_usersheet,
		note_text,
		note_creator,
		create_date,
		extra_string_1,
		extra_string_2,
		extra_string_3,
		load_time
	)) ~> SubmitSheetTRM

source(output(
		id_attribute as string,
		id_project as string,
		id_attr_type as string,
		string_value as string,
		numeric_value as integer,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProjectAttr
source(output(
		id_project as string,
		description as string,
		id_parent as string,
		hours_estimate as integer,
		percent_complete as integer,
		creator as string,
		loggable as string,
		pname as string,
		id_domain as string,
		project_type as integer,
		wbs as string,
		id_owner as string,
		id_backup as string,
		rm_type as integer,
		state as integer,
		work_variance as integer,
		start_variance as integer,
		end_variance as integer,
		duration_variance as integer,
		scheduled_work as integer,
		scheduled_start as integer,
		scheduled_end as integer,
		scheduled_duration as integer,
		projected_cost as integer,
		projected_return as integer,
		projected_profit as integer,
		projected_roi as integer,
		awaiting_export as integer,
		is_hidden as integer,
		allow_time as integer,
		allow_expense as integer,
		allow_custom as integer,
		allow_leave as integer,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Project
source(output(
		id_attribute as string,
		id_user as string,
		id_attr_type as string,
		string_value as string,
		numeric_value as integer,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> UserAttr
source(output(
		id_user as string,
		reserved1 as string,
		reserved2 as integer,
		timerecs_in as integer,
		timerecs_out as integer,
		daysinlist as integer,
		fullname as string,
		u_comment as string,
		reserved3 as integer,
		expense_gui as string,
		time_gui as string,
		id_domain as string,
		travel_gui as string,
		user_login as string,
		is_hidden as integer,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> User
source(output(
		id_project as string,
		description as string,
		id_parent as string,
		hours_estimate as integer,
		percent_complete as integer,
		creator as string,
		loggable as string,
		pname as string,
		id_domain as string,
		project_type as integer,
		wbs as string,
		id_owner as string,
		id_backup as string,
		rm_type as integer,
		state as integer,
		work_variance as integer,
		start_variance as integer,
		end_variance as integer,
		duration_variance as integer,
		scheduled_work as integer,
		scheduled_start as integer,
		scheduled_end as integer,
		scheduled_duration as integer,
		projected_cost as integer,
		projected_return as integer,
		projected_profit as integer,
		projected_roi as integer,
		awaiting_export as integer,
		is_hidden as integer,
		allow_time as integer,
		allow_expense as integer,
		allow_custom as integer,
		allow_leave as integer,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProjectSelf
source(output(
		User_Logon_Name as string,
		Name as string,
		First_Name as string,
		Last_Name as string,
		Type as string,
		Status as string,
		City as string,
		Company as string,
		Country as string,
		Department as string,
		Job_Title as string,
		Display_Name as string,
		Email as string,
		Mobile as string,
		Employee_Number as string,
		Office as string,
		State as string,
		Street as string,
		Street_Number as string,
		Postal_Code as string,
		Personal_Country as string,
		Personal_City as string,
		Personal_Street as string,
		Personal_Street_Number as string,
		Personal_Latitude as double,
		Personal_Longitude as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmployeDetail
ProjectAttr pivot(groupBy(id_project),
	pivotBy(id_attr_type, ['projects_state', 'projects_pay_period_type', 'FE1C4D54B6FD46F59B934B000018DD8A', 'A0EA5FCC6CE6403E8E40E75344BE8154', '2A0F782F45E74D7888211D451E6C3B9A', '38DBB13CA9194E52886C820C9557D9B6', 'projects_bill_rate', 'AB822D8DA3DC4BAC9A7EE3529F0C27BD', 'projects_priority', 'projects_enddate', 'projects_bill_period_type', '8AD8DA50E8094784A30D58A539F4E2B0', 'F47778670C1040848C1076880C45895D', 'DD77F3D93AB74971846BD7C99631E98F']),
	P1 = sum(numeric_value),
		P2 = max(string_value),
	columnNaming: '$V$N',
	lateral: false) ~> ProjectAttrMap
ProjectAttrMap select(mapColumn(
		id_project,
		projects_state = projects_stateP2,
		projects_pay_period_type = projects_pay_period_typeP2,
		projects_country = FE1C4D54B6FD46F59B934B000018DD8AP2,
		latitude = F47778670C1040848C1076880C45895DP2,
		purchase_order = {2A0F782F45E74D7888211D451E6C3B9AP2},
		projects_invoice_party = {38DBB13CA9194E52886C820C9557D9B6P2},
		projects_bill_rate = projects_bill_rateP1,
		purchase_order_item = AB822D8DA3DC4BAC9A7EE3529F0C27BDP2,
		projects_priority = projects_priorityP2,
		longitude = DD77F3D93AB74971846BD7C99631E98FP2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> ProjectAttrSelect
JoinProject select(mapColumn(
		id_project = ProjectAttrSelect@id_project,
		projects_state,
		projects_pay_period_type,
		projects_country,
		latitude,
		purchase_order,
		projects_invoice_party,
		projects_bill_rate,
		purchase_order_item,
		projects_priority,
		longitude,
		description,
		id_parent,
		hours_estimate,
		percent_complete,
		loggable,
		project_name,
		project_type,
		state,
		is_hidden,
		allow_time,
		allow_expense,
		allow_custom,
		allow_leave,
		load_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> ProjectSelect
UserAttr pivot(groupBy(id_user),
	pivotBy(id_attr_type, ['users_enddate', 'users_title', 'users_emp_num', 'users_rate_period_type', 'users_emp_type', 'users_manager', 'users_email', 'users_pay_rate_type', 'users_phone', 'org_supervisor', 'users_dept', 'RMOVERHEADRATE', 'RMWEEKLYHOURSDEFAULT', 'users_startdate']),
	P1 = max(string_value),
		P2 = sum(numeric_value),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> UserAttrMap
UserAttrMap select(mapColumn(
		id_user,
		P1Users_startdate = P1users_startdate,
		P1users_enddate,
		P1users_title,
		P1users_emp_num,
		P1users_rate_period_type,
		P1users_emp_type,
		P1users_manager,
		P1users_email,
		P1users_pay_rate_type,
		P1users_phone,
		P1org_supervisor,
		P1users_dept,
		P2RMOVERHEADRATE,
		P2RMWEEKLYHOURSDEFAULT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UserAttrSelect
UserAttrSelect, User join(UserAttrSelect@id_user == User@id_user,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'both')~> JoinUserANDattr
JoinUserANDattr select(mapColumn(
		id_user = UserAttrSelect@id_user,
		user_start_date = P1Users_startdate,
		user_end_date = P1users_enddate,
		users_emp_num = P1users_emp_num,
		users_rate_period_type = P1users_rate_period_type,
		user_emp_type = P1users_emp_type,
		user_email = P1users_email,
		users_pay_rate_type = P1users_pay_rate_type,
		user_phone = P1users_phone,
		user_dept = P1users_dept,
		fullname,
		expense_gui,
		time_gui,
		travel_gui,
		user_login,
		is_hidden,
		load_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UserSelect
Project select(mapColumn(
		id_project,
		description,
		id_parent,
		hours_estimate,
		percent_complete,
		loggable,
		project_name = pname,
		project_type,
		state,
		is_hidden,
		allow_time,
		allow_expense,
		allow_custom,
		allow_leave,
		load_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectColumns
ProjectAttrSelect, SelectColumns join(ProjectAttrSelect@id_project == SelectColumns@id_project,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'both')~> JoinProject
ProjectSelf select(mapColumn(
		id_project,
		description_parent = description,
		project_parent_name = pname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> ParentProject
ProjectSelect, ParentProject join(id_parent == ParentProject@id_project,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinParentProject
JoinParentProject select(mapColumn(
		id_project = ProjectSelect@id_project,
		projects_state,
		projects_pay_period_type,
		projects_country,
		latitude,
		purchase_order,
		projects_invoice_party,
		projects_bill_rate,
		purchase_order_item,
		projects_priority,
		longitude,
		description,
		id_parent,
		hours_estimate,
		percent_complete,
		loggable,
		project_name,
		project_type,
		state,
		is_hidden,
		allow_time,
		allow_expense,
		allow_custom,
		allow_leave,
		load_time,
		description_parent,
		project_parent_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectProject
SelectProject derive(Project_Currency_key = case(projects_country=='SG','SGD','EUR'),
		load_time = currentTimestamp()) ~> LoadDateP
SelectUserColumns derive(load_time = currentTimestamp(),
		user_start_date = toDate((concat(substring(user_start_date,0,4),'-',substring(user_start_date,5,2),'-',substring(user_start_date,7,2)))),
		user_end_date = toDate((concat(substring(user_end_date,0,4),'-',substring(user_end_date,5,2),'-',substring(user_end_date,7,2)))),
		state = iif( isNull(user_end_date), 'ACTIVE','INACTIVE')) ~> LoadDateU
UserSelect, EmployeDetail join(user_email == Email,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> GetLocationDetails
GetLocationDetails select(mapColumn(
		id_user,
		user_start_date,
		user_end_date,
		users_emp_num,
		users_rate_period_type,
		user_emp_type,
		user_email,
		users_pay_rate_type,
		user_phone,
		user_dept,
		fullname,
		expense_gui,
		time_gui,
		travel_gui,
		user_login,
		is_hidden,
		load_time,
		Personal_Latitude,
		Personal_Longitude
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectUserColumns
LoadDateP sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> ProjectTRM
LoadDateU sink(input(
		id_user as string,
		user_start_date as date,
		user_end_date as date,
		users_emp_num as string,
		users_rate_period_type as string,
		user_emp_type as string,
		user_email as string,
		users_pay_rate_type as string,
		user_phone as string,
		user_dept as string,
		fullname as string,
		expense_gui as string,
		time_gui as string,
		travel_gui as string,
		user_login as string,
		is_hidden as integer,
		load_time as timestamp,
		latitude as double,
		logitude as double,
		STATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id_user,
		user_start_date,
		user_end_date,
		users_emp_num,
		users_rate_period_type,
		user_emp_type,
		user_email,
		users_pay_rate_type,
		user_phone,
		user_dept,
		fullname,
		expense_gui,
		time_gui,
		travel_gui,
		user_login,
		is_hidden,
		load_time,
		latitude = Personal_Latitude,
		logitude = Personal_Longitude,
		STATE = state
	),
	dateFormat:'yyyy-MM-dd') ~> UserTRM

source(output(
		{Matching value LMDB} as string,
		{Matching value LMDB II} as string,
		{Site Ship To (char)} as integer,
		Date as string,
		{Transaction Time} as string,
		{Transaction ID} as integer,
		{Card Number} as integer,
		{Transaction Value} as decimal(9,3),
		{Transaction Quantity} as decimal(9,3)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> ASQLLOYALTY
ASQLLOYALTY derive({Merged Date} = toTimestamp(concat(Date,' ',{Transaction Time}),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mm:ss.SSS')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive({Merged Date Ahead} = add({Merged Date} , seconds(240)),
		{Merged Date Behind} = add({Merged Date} , seconds(-240))) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 sink(input(
		{Matching value LMDB} as string,
		{Matching value LMDB II} as string,
		{Site Ship To (char)} as integer,
		Date as string,
		{Transaction Time} as string,
		{Transaction ID} as integer,
		{Card Number} as integer,
		{Transaction Value} as decimal(9,3),
		{Transaction Quantity} as decimal(9,3),
		datefurture as binary,
		datepast as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{Matching value LMDB},
		{Matching value LMDB II},
		{Site Ship To (char)},
		Date,
		{Transaction Time},
		{Transaction ID},
		{Card Number},
		{Transaction Value},
		{Transaction Quantity},
		datefurture = {Merged Date Behind},
		datepast = {Merged Date Ahead}
	)) ~> sink1

query.value:
select '"'||SCHEMA_NAME||'"'||'.'||'"'||TABLE_NAME||'"' AS Table_Name, SUBSTR_AFTER(TABLE_NAME,'::') as FILE_NAME from public.tables
where "SCHEMA_NAME" ='ACQ_TE' and "TABLE_TYPE" = 'COLUMN'
